Name: Superpowers
Description: Superpowers: You can now use 5 powers at a time to get double effect from them!

Name: Seeing Circles
Description: Better Draft Indicator: The circle that shows you where drafts are is now bigger and appears more often!

Name: Couch Potato
Description: The bonus armies received from watching ads is permanently increased by 50%!

Name: The Legend
Description: You received an Epic Triple Strike artifact!

Name: Rock Candy
Description: You received a mine doubler!  One of your mines will now permanently give twice as much ore.  You can switch which mine is doubled at any time.

Name: Super Armies
Description: The Supercamp now gives 10% more armies permanently!

Name: 4th Boy
Description: You received a permanent 4th artifact slot for active artifacts!

Name: Gladiator
Description: All Arena rewards are permanently increased by 20%!

Name: Molification
Description: All artifact dig times are permanently reduced by 10%!

Name: Protection
Description: Attacks against you in battles are permanently decreased by 10%!

Name: Updater
Description: You received the Update All button, which can update all of your multi-levels at once instead of having to open each one!
